text: aho ! visvasa kalavuni, numbala atara ekangatavayakin yutu vyaparayakin (læbena dæ anubhava kirima) hæra numbalage vastuva numbala væradi lesa anubhava nokaranu. tavada numbala (gætalu æti kara ganimin) numbalavama ghatanaya nokaranu. niyata vasayenma allah numbala kerehi asamasama karunanvitaya
